description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Can you steer the little rocket to its little target? Hello Rocket features hours of gameplay, hilarious physics-based demolition and lots of replay value. Complete with 72 levels of toppling towers, exploding bombs, rolling orbs and cute little bad guys that you bump into and knock over. Best. Game. Ever.
